amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Small Business Administrations Entrepreneurial Development Programs, for the SBAs Veterans Business Outreach Centers by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to increase by $1 million funding for the Small Business Administrations Entrepreneurial Development Programs, for the SBAs Veterans Business Outreach Centers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Suozzi amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 406 - 19 (Roll no. 418).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Suozzi amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 406 - 19 (Roll no. 418).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Suozzi.
